articles.title: Wilco judge calls health department’s Christmas closure ‘hogwash,’ county sits on 900 COVID-19 vaccine doses - KXAN.com
articles.description: Williamson County Judge Bill Gravell criticized county public health officials on Friday for closing down operations until after Christmas instead of administering hundreds of COVID-19 vaccine doses they received earlier in the week.
